title: Client Issues
body: Lately i've been getting issues with the client freezing, resulting in me not being able to join a game. This has happened multiple times this week, resulting in me getting a leaverbuster of 5 20 minute sessions. Is there a client issue or is it something on my end? I have the latest client, great internet and nothing wrong with my computer. I'm afraid to even join a ranked game because I don't want to get perma banned for leaving a lot of games when I can't even join them in the first place.

replies.body: When exactly is your client freezing, what do you see?  If it's at champion select, make sure you aren't using third party programs that interact with league as they've been known to caus eissues like this.  If you have any running like play.tv or lolrecorder remove them.  Let me know!
happened to me once, i tried reconnecting but it didnt even show the reconnect button. then i saw my match history and it said there was a remake and i loss lp
